text: Tse nadto ye blahoslovenne svyate pysannya shcho my vidkryly, pidtverdzhuyuchy poperedni svyati pysannya, shcho vy mozhete poperedyty naybilʹshu vazhlyvu spilʹnotu ta vsyu tsyu navkolo tse. Tsey khto viryatʹ v U maybutnʹomu bude viryty v tse (svyate pysannya), ta zauvazhytʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat)
